resources.string: Can\'t connect to SoundCloud.com. This usually means that SoundCloud servers are down or your network connection is too slow.
Can\'t connect to MyCloudPlayers.com. This usually means that Our servers are down or your network connection is too slow.
Can\'t display comments for current track.
There are no comments. You can be the first to comment on this track…
Theme is changed. Activity will restart to apply the changes.
There is no data to build Charts
Some downloaded or cached tracks are not included in this mPlaylists.
You have to be connected with your SoundCloud account in order to save mPlaylists.\n\nConnect now?
Default Action when browsing playlists and mPlaylists

Use external files directory for caching tracks
* disable this only if you have problems playing cached tracks

Show Download Original in track menu
*originals are saved in External Music folder. Be aware, sometimes originals are much bigger size than mp3
Remove track from current mPlaylist Guesture
Resume Audio on headphones jack plug in
Show Cache and Download Track in context menu when browsing tracks
Scale track artwork to fit in card
Remote Client Media Control on LockScreen (Android 4.x)
search by title, artist, label, genre…
search by group title or description…
Selected folder is not empty. Please select empty folder.
Cannot move downloaded tracks to new folder.
Overwrite existing or create new mPlaylist
Error occurred, please try again later
Can\'t stream this track.\nLoading next track…
This track is not streamable outside SoundCloud. Playing next track…
Can\'t retrieve current mPlaylist. Please start My Cloud Player to use the widget.
Enter url to your custom image

Stations are Live mPlaylists created from tracks users have played.

 When you 'Tune In', you will start listening the same music as the user who created the station and current mPlaylist will be automatically updated.

 All Stations are anonymous by default. You can set your station by clicking Setup Your Station on previous screen or on http://mycloudplayers.com from your desktop browser.

 Stations with Title and Artwork are listed first in the list.

 You can also browse and listen stations on your desktop browser on http://stations.mycloudplayers.com

 If you have any questions, feel free to contact us by email.

Simple Last.fm Scrobbler Found
in case not scrobbling, open Simple Last.fm Scrobbler and check your settings
No tracks found for search term:
No Cached tracks found. \n\nYou can put track in cache from main screen or context menu (long press) on any of the tracks.
No Downloaded tracks found. \n\nYou can download tracks from main screen or context menu (long press) on downloadable tracks.
No tracks found in your Dashboard. \n\nPlease start following some users. You can do this on context menu (long press) on any of the tracks.
No tracks found in your Stream. \n\nPlease start following some users. You can do this on context menu (long press) on any of the tracks.
You have no tracks uploaded to soundcloud. \n\nPlease use SoundCloud official App or SoundCloud.com and be sure to read and follow the Community Guidelines before uploading.
You have no tracks reposted. \n\nYou can repost track from main screen or context menu (long press) on any of the tracks.
You have no tracks in your likes. \n\nYou can like a track from main screen or context menu (long press) on any of the tracks.
share listened tracks, comments and likes on your g+ profile
Equalizer is not available for your device.
Error loading presets. Only custom EQ available.

Taking a few seconds to rate an app is very important for the developer.\r\nIt allows us to continually improve the experience, and, helps other users decide whether an app is right for them.\r\nHow about telling us what you think?

Dark Widget mode
adapt colors for bright backgrounds
New version %s is available.\n\n Press OK to update the app from play store

Phone Layout
* don\'t show current mPlaylist on main screen

Podcast Mode
* skip 5 mins when holding volume down remote button on long tracks
Enable Auto Fade on Next track \n* experimental, disable if there are errors
Show Track Genres in list view
Connection to the server established.\nXMBC v%s found
Connection to the cast device is temporarily lost
Connection to the cast device is recovered
Connection to the cast device has been temporarily lost. Application is trying to recover connection, please try again later
No connection to the cast device exist
Control how the application behaves on the TV

Music Player, Downloader and Last.fm scrobbler powered by SoundCloud.

Explore and listen music from SoundCloud just like on any other music player, save and share mPlaylists and much, much more.

This application uses SoundCloud API and our servers, you need internet connection to create and listen mPlaylists.

Google+ Community for Beta Testers, if you want to help with Translation or you have suggestion/bug to report: https://plus.google.com/communities/113819735478774735842
Big thanks to:

JF Tolaguera - Main Activity and Menu/Icons Design and Layout
https://twitter.com/JFTolaguera
https://plus.google.com/u/0/114818664580849056047

//.dax - Slovak translation
Viktor Zuber & Petar Kajevski - Macedonian translation
Bang B.M - Korean translation
Konstantin Kruglov - Russian translation

Ben Scheffer - Dutch translation

Ali Salcido - Spanish translation

Riste Ajtov - Italian translation

The Android Open Source Project (www.android.com)

If you have any questions, bug reports or feature suggestions, feel free to contact us.

What\'s new

v9.4b1
- Added Search Mixes
- Resolved media error -1004 on 2.x devices
- Hide ChromeCast button if device not present
- Optional disable ChromeCast service in Settings
- Optional disable XBMC icon in Settings
- ID3 artwork loaded with mp3agick lib is exist
- Exit in the menu clears most of the resources. Still strugling with VideoCastNotificationService.
- More speed improvements, code cleanup and refactoring, UI updates and bug fixes

v9.3
- Fixed missing ChromeCast button
- Fixed current track artwork loading
- Added Share in track context menu

v9.2.1
- Fixed Local media activity
- Slovak translation added, thanks to //.dax

v9.2
- Added Language override
- Added Local media Albums, Artists, Genres, Playlists
- UI and code fixes and updates

v9.1.2
- Fixed Sleep Timer on older devices
- Bugfixes for older devices

v9.1
- Backwards compatibility down to Android 2.3
- Added RTMP support. Media Error 1004 should be gone now.
- Added this app in default actions for Audio files
- Synced track artwork with background
- Fixed Clear Current mPlaylist
- Fixed goto Current mPlaylist button in left menu

v9.0.1
- Fixed Artwork when ChromeCasting local audio

v9.0
- Play Local Audio files support
- Local Audio Chromecast support added. Thanks to NanoHttpD lib.
- Improved Saved mPlaylists. Mixing Apples and Oranges together now it\'s possible. Save remote, local, cached and downloaded tracks together in one playlist.
- Album/Track artwork auto grabber for Local audio
- Pro version added
- Optimized app starting time
- Speed and memory optimizations
- Image loader memory usage optimizations
- UI updates
- Fixed the most annoying bug, autostart on app force close
- Other minor bugfixes and updates

v8.2
- Prefer play from cache (if track is cached) when using mobile data network
- Macedonian Translation updated
- UI update
v8.1.1
- UI / Waveform color update
- Macedonian Translation added
- Force close fix and other minor updates
v8.1
- Autoplay next track when ChromeCast is enabled
- Added Prev/Next buttons in notification
- Added Prev/Next buttons on lock screen
- Reworked UI
- Blurred artwork background added. Can be disabled in settings.
v8.0
- ChromeCast support added, advanced options will be added soon
- Notification update
- Clear playlist button added
- Removed startup animation
- Other bug fixes and minor updates
v7.5
- Fixed audio handling on Incoming Call without or without Headphones
- Removed Dashboard from left Menu. After Soundcloud removed favorites from Dashboard, Stream is the same as Dashboard plus it contains User\'s Reposts
v7.4.1
- Bug fixes
v7.4
- My Cloud Player Playlists are renamed to mPlaylists
- SoundCloud Sets are renamed to Playlists
- UI updates for full KitKat translucent experience
v7.3
- FC Fix for old tablets
- Added Push to My Cloud Cast in track menu (if My Cloud Cast is installed)
- Minor bug fixes
v7.2
- Fixed overlapping NavBar on Kit Kat Themes
- Minor bug fixes
v7.1
- Added Push to XBMC (Mirror mode), allows you can listen the music directly on your media center. Seek Track is not working until SoundCloud add-on for XBMC starts to support this.
- Fixed Auto Fade between tracks
- Universal Image Loader updates
- Kit Kat UI update, Translucent action bar added
- Minor UI (full orange theme) and code improvements
v7.0
- Themes upgraded to Holo Orange
- Universal Image Loader is integrated for much better image loading performance
- UI improvements, code optimizations, resulting with much better performance
- Added Users Sort options
- Hide Cache/Download option if track is already Cached or Downloaded.
- Non streamable tracks are removed from the lists, these tracks were causing Media Error - 1004
- Removed Donate via PayPal button due to Play Store ToS changes. You can still support the development by clicking on the Ads in the app
- More optimizations and less ram usage for older devices
v6.5.3
- X button on Notification stops the service and releases the Remote Media Control listeners. Now it\'s the same as Exit from the menu.
- Fixed code that caused Force Close of the service
v6.5.2
- Battery usage optimization. App releases Wifi Lock on pause when playing online tracks
v6.5.1
- Fixed mPlaylists and Playlists screens
v6.5
- Korean translation added, thanks to Bang B.M
- Added Setup Your Station Screen
- Improved Recommended and Stations sections
- Added Auto Fade and fade time on Next track (experimental) in Settings
- Improved Fade between current and next track
- Pause button keeps the service in foreground.
Use Exit from the menu, 2x Back on main screen or X button from notification to shut down the service
- Localization updates
- Added Follow/Unfollow in User context menu
- Fixed problem with notification when track has not artwork
- Fixed Scrobbling via Simple Last.fm Scrobbler
- UI and Code updates
v6.3
- Added Recommended section for logged users. Find Tracks (you\'ve never listened before) and Users by music you\'ve listened on the app
- Added is following you/you follow indicators on user lists, and Follow back on user info activity
- Added Enable Fade Out in Settings
- Added Show Genre in Settings
- Added Banners on not important screens. If you like the app, you can click on the Ads to support the developer
- More optimizations on App init launch
- Minor bug fixes
v6.2.1
- Fixed Connect to SoundCloud
v6.2
- Added System DSP Support, if available
- Remote Playback Toggle keeps the service active and able to receive commands after a longer period if inactivity
- Added Private Playlists Support
- Added Support this App screen.
Now you can support the development by clicking on the ads on Support screen
- Unicode support in search
- Fixed Repeat mode when pre-cache is enabled
- Fixed crash on Android 2.2
- Other minor bug fixes
v6.1
- Added Bass Boost in Equalizer screen
- Fixed EQ when playing pre-cached track
- Fixed Add Comment and Add to mPlaylist/Set
- Other minor bug fixes
v6.0
- Huge optimizations for older devices
- Bitmap resources optimization
- UI updates
- PagerTabStrip replaced with PagerSlidingTabStrip library
- Memory and CPU usage improvement
- Better Playback Control on incoming call and headphones detection
- Added PodCast Mode option - Fast Forward when holding volume down button on device, headphones or remote controls
- Android 4.4 KitKat Support
- Removed v7 support library
- SDK Build Tools updated to 19
v5.8.2
- Fixed \'Play Now\' and \'Play Next\' when Pre-Cache is enabled
- Fixed Auto Start when call ended
v5.8.1
- Widgets updates and fixes for Android 2.x
- Minor bug fixes and code improvements
v5.8
- Added 3 New Widgets with artwork
- Added Pre-caching of the next track Audio Stream and Images - Optional, enable this in settings
- Added Fade out of previous track on next track
- Added option in Setting to disable Pre-Cache next track, enabled by default on Android 4.1+
- Added Edit mPlaylist screen in mPlaylist context menu
- Added Default Action when browsing Playlists and mPlaylist in Settings
- Added Contribute Track to Group
- Added Remove Contributed Track from Group
- Italian translation added, thanks to Riste Ajtov
- Fixed other user Likes section
- More Speed improvements
- More Bug fixes
v5.7.7
- Fixed crash on start for some users
- Duplicate genres listing fix
- Phone Layout mode added in settings for Large and X-Large screens, hide current mPlaylist on main screen
- Added In App version checker
v5.7.5
- Genres update, list latest browsed genres on top, Custom genres will be listed here as well
- Tracks listing Design improvements
- Speed improvements on launch, loading extra user data is moved to background
- Code improvements and bug fixes
v5.7.2
- Sleep Timer fix for Android 2.x
v5.7.1
- Settings Screen fix
- Context Menu fix in Track Info screen
- SDK Build Tools updated to 18.1.1
v5.7
- Spanish translation added, thanks to Ali Salcido
- Added Add to Playlist in Current Track context menu
- Added G+ Deep Links handler for interactive posts in the future.
- Added Share Interactive Post on Google+
- Added Default Share Action in Settings
- Quick Search in Action bar fix
- Connect screen fix
- Whats new and About screen updates
v5.6.1
- Dashboard fix
- Delete Moments fix
- Settings screen fix
v5.6
- Code optimizations and speed improvements
- Shuffle algorithm improvements. Tracks will not repeat until whole mPlaylist is played and Prev/Next works in shuffle mode.
- Waveform progress added
- Switched to Roboto Light font for Android 4.1+
- Added \'New\' prefix to tracks uploaded in last 48 hours
- Added TimeStamp in Play History list
- Improved Downloaded tracks scan, now you can put any mp3 file in Download folder and play it with the player. It\'s not perfect but it works.
- Added Convert Playlist to mPlaylist
- Google+ Moments History screen added
- Delete Play history and Google+ moment entry
- Logged user comments added back in menu
- Design and Notification updates
v5.5
- Added Dark Widget Colors mode (for light backgrounds) - in Settings
- Left Menu header update, minimizes on scroll
- Click on Header menu image (above login/username) will open \'Now playing\' screen
- Added Sleep minutes picker dialog
- Dutch translation added, thanks to Ben Scheffer
- Russian translation update
- Fixed Press 2x back to exit - stop service
- Fix for old devices without Google Play Services installed
- Icons update
v5.4
- Added Audio Equalizer
- Added Equalizer Presets
- Added Quick Search in Current mPlaylist
- Added Quick Search in Tracks, Playlists, Users and Groups list
- Added Google+ moments integration when listening or commenting on track. Sign in with Google+ in settings screen to enable this feature
- Fixed Network on main thread exception
- Improved Fragments data load speed
- Code and UI improvements
v5.3
- Added Convert mPlaylist to Playlist
- Added Add Track to Playlist, Edit Playlist, Delete Playlist
- Added Sleep Timer
- Added Put in Cache and Download buttons in Track info screen
- Added SoundCloud URL in Track info screen
- UI speed improvements
- Fixed Audio Focus handler
- Fixed \'Click to Remove\' mode bug
- Changed Favorites to Likes (Star icon with Heart)
- Updated notification to use 500x500px artwork
v5.1
- Fixed \'No Internet Connection\' bug
- Added \'Play Now\' in Settings - Default Track action when browsing tracks, if you\'ve changed this before, you need to re-set it again
- Added Favorite Playlist in context menu
- Added Settings - Use Only Wi-Fi Network for streaming remote tracks
- Added Genre (click to browse) in Track Info activity
- Added Sort Options in action bar when browsing tracks
- Fixed Random start playing music (probably, please send a feedback)
v5.0
- Russian translation added, thanks to Konstantin Kruglov
- Waveform image is clickable - Seek Track
- Added Favorite Playlists
- Fixed hidden My Followers and Followings from the menu
- UI and Menu redesign (big thanks to JF Tolaguera)
- Added Left Menu drawer on every screen
- Added Current mPlaylist drawer on every screen
- Added Mini Player Controls in Current mPlaylist drawer
- Added Track Progress indicator in Mini Player controls
- Added Track and User Info screens
- Removed Browse User Resources from left menu
- Much better handling when SoundCloud servers are down
- Improved Related tracks method
- Fixed Save track order on Exit for Cached and Downloaded tracks
- Created Google Plus Community for Beta Testers and feedback
